channel.title: Automotive on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Automotive on FinanClub

item.title: GM
item.description: score:189 Chances: General Motors’ self-driving car unit, Cruise, is preparing to resume testing its robotaxis with safety drivers in Phoenix, which could indicate progress in its attempts to resume service after grounding its fleet last year. Vehicle sales of Ford, Toyota, and Honda have increased year over year in the United States, suggesting a positive trend in the automotive industry.

item.title: BB
item.description: score:257 Chances: BlackBerry (BB) is introducing new initiatives like QNX Everywhere and QNX Sound, addressing the growing demand for skilled embedded systems developers and showcasing their commitment to innovation and growth. The collaboration with MIH Consortium and the deployment of the IVY platform for electric vehicle platform demonstrates BlackBerry’s potential for expansion in the automotive industry, a promising opportunity for future revenue growth.
